name: myloc
description: Insert your current location into Obsidian notes

scripts.deploy: npm run build && bash -c 'source .env && cp main.js manifest.json "$OBSIDIAN_PLUGIN_PATH" && [ -n "$OBSIDIAN_TEST_PLUGIN_PATH" ] && mkdir -p "$OBSIDIAN_TEST_PLUGIN_PATH" && cp main.js manifest.json "$OBSIDIAN_TEST_PLUGIN_PATH" || true'
